messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Are you going to the Pal Park, too?For you, I’m willing to show off my
prized Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
So? Hot stuff, huh?
That’s why I’m so proud of my Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Pal Park, huh? I wonder what kinds
of Pokémon you can see there?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Listen, did you go to the Pal Park?
What was it like? What was it like?
